overview: There are many different professions in the world. Someone chooses their own business, for someone decide the circumstances or parents... But there is one person in the world for whom this choice was made by the stars. His recognition is to bring happiness to people, more precisely, to women. But one trip to Vietnam turns his whole stable life upside down. And now the stars are not able to tell him the right decision. He must accept it himself.
title: Август
